name: Gunrun longrun
description:
This is an endless runner where you have to avoid touching the robots, jumping, running or shooting and more ways coming soon.

  • NEW GUNS!
  • NEW ENEMIES!
  • HISTORY MODE!
  • MUSIC AND SFX!
  • AND MORE!

Hi! My name is Héctor, the H is mute, this is my first game, i would appreciate a lot all the feedback you can give. I expect to make updates soon, i have so many ideas! Have a nice game day, have fun!

¡¡¡CLICK HERE TO READ!!!
